summary: Set in the 1930s, and narrated like a ballad from the past, The Tiger from Tjampa tells of how a young man, Lukman, seeks to avenge his father's murder by learning pencak silat, a ... See full summary »
cast: Wahid Chan|Bambang Hermanto|R.D. Ismail|Malin Maradjo|Nurnaningsih|Titi Savitri
title: Harimau Tjampa
